amendment.description: To prohibit the use of amounts made available by this bill to purchase new passenger motor vehicles.

vote.text: Amendment SA 798 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 798 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 738. (consideration: CR S6758) To prohibit the use of amounts made available by this bill to purchase new passenger motor vehicles.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 798 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 798 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 738.
